title: Drawing, "Design for Castle Exterior Scene, for Othello", 1932
inscribed: Inscribed in white chalk, upper right: 2 Cyprus stree[cut off]; upper left: detail crenel[cut off]; lower right: Before the castle [underlined]
dimensions: H x W: 17 x 24 cm (6 11/16 x 9 7/16 in.), irregular
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Cyprus castle exterior design set. Upper margin: detail of ornamented crenellation with double points; left margin: detail of crenellated tower. Main drawing depicts exterior of castle entrance. From left, partial brick building, ornamented building façade with arched doorway, a crenellated wall, stairs and another building with an arched doorway. Below, there are markings in white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Castle Exterior Scene, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Color crayon on black paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-187.
